    # 基本色彩

    Developing an organized, consistent and beautiful color palette is critical to the design success of a project. Tailwind provides a fantastic color system that makes this very easy to accomplish.

    # 主要色彩

    GREY#B8C2CC
    RED#E3342F
    ORANGE#F6993F
    YELLOW#FFED4A
    GREEN#38C172
    TEAL#4DC0B5
    BLUE#3490DC
    INDIGO#6574CD
    PURPLE#9561E2
    PINK#F66D9B
